data.title: Undergraduate, University of York
data.meta_description: Explore what studying and living in York is really like at one of our undergraduate Open Days.
data.text:
Our upcoming Open Days will cover information suitable for Year 12 applicants considering applying to start university in September 2025. If you have not been able to attend a visit day for offer holders, you can visit campus independently at any time.

We recommend downloading our app, Visit UoY, which allows you to take an outdoor, self-guided tour of our campus, narrated by our current students.

Details of how to travel to campus can be found on our transport and parking page.

You won't need to book a place at individual sessions and talks. Once you've booked a place on an Open Day, you will have access to all the talks and sessions taking place at that event. Some talks may be busy, in which case priority will be given to students before guests.

You're welcome to visit our campus at any time that suits you. Our app, Visit UoY, will allow you to take an outdoor, self-guided tour of our campus, narrated by our current students.

Details of how to travel to campus can be found on our transport and parking page.

If you would like to change your booking to the alternate date, please email us at openday@york.ac.uk and quote the reference number stated in your confirmation email.

This will allow us to cancel your current booking. You will then need to complete another booking form, selecting your preferred date.

Please note: the person who made the booking will need to be the one who emails us - we can't make booking amendment requests from a third party enquirer.

If you would like to change the subjects you have booked your Open Day for, please email us at openday@york.ac.uk and quote the reference number stated in your confirmation email.

Please note: the person who made the booking will need to be the one who emails us - we can't make booking amendment requests from a third party enquirer.
